title: How to Use Google's Gemini CLI for AI Code Assistance
description: Learn how to use Gemini CLI to bring Google's AI-powered coding assistance directly into your terminal to help you analyze and fix code.
content: This tutorial will teach you how to use Gemini CLI to bring Google’s AI-powered coding assistance directly into your terminal. After you authenticate with your Google account, this tool will be ready… [+31892 chars]
